department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Summary of RFI Electronic Traveller Health Informationtion (eTHI)
description: This document provides a summary of feedback received from the RFI and one-on-one vendor demonstration sessions HT218-234191/B.
full_summary:
**Summary of Request for Information (RFI) Electronic Traveler Health Information (eTHI)**
==========================================================

**Tender Reference: WS4056891315**
--------------------------------

**Publication Date:** 2023-12-14
**Closing Date:** 2100-12-14T14:00:00

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has released a Request for Information (RFI) for the Electronic Traveler Health Information (eTHI) project, soliciting feedback from vendors and stakeholders. This document provides a summary of the RFI and one-on-one vendor demonstration sessions.

**Notice Details:**
-------------------

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4056891315
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-12-14
*   **Closing Date:** 2100-12-14T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31

**Notice Type:**
----------------

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Information (RFI)

**Procedure:**
--------------

This procurement is open to all interested vendors. The selection criteria are not applicable.

**Trade Agreements:**
-------------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Regions of Delivery:**
----------------------

*   **National Capital Region (NCR)**

**Contact Information:**
----------------------

Sidi-Mohammed Belcaid, PSPC
sidi-mohammed.belcaid@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Related links to the full tender announcement can be found at: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18282646?extsite=MTgyODI2ND
